Message: UUID id, role enum(system|user|assistant|tool), content string, timestamp ISO8601
ChatRequest: message string (1-4000), conversation_id uuid?, context object, agent_override enum?, stream bool, temperature number 0-2, max_tokens int
ChatResponse: response string, conversation_id uuid, agent_type enum, message Message, metadata object, processing_time float, token_usage object
Agent: id string, name string, type enum, status enum, model string, capabilities[], usage_count int
